title: Real Estate Property Management System
description: This full-stack application serves as a comprehensive solution for real estate property management, connecting property owners, developers, and potential buyers. Built using the MERN stack along with advanced features in Chakra UI for a responsive and modern UI/UX, the platform allows users to browse properties, add new listings, and manage existing ones with ease.

title: My INotebook
description: A MERN stack application designed for efficient note management. Users can sign up, log in, and then create, update, or delete their personal notes. Featuring a ReactJS frontend, Express and NodeJS backend, and MongoDB database, the app provides a secure and user-friendly platform for real-time note management.

title: Build Your Personal Blog Platform
description: Are you looking to start your own blog website but don't know how to code? Look no further! With Next.js and Firebase, you can easily create and manage your own blog website without any coding experience. Simply log in and start writing articles that will engage and inspire your readers. With the added security of Firebase, you can ensure that your website and content are safe and secure. Start your blogging journey today with Next.js and Firebase.

title: Interactive Periodic Table Map
description: I designed a MERN project that presents information in the format of a periodic table. This interactive application enables users to build customized 'periodic tables' with the ability to compare, delete, and block specific elements. It showcases my expertise in full-stack development and creating unique, interactive representations of data

title: Ecommerce Store
description: Built on the MERN stack and enhanced with Redux for streamlined state management, this E-Commerce store delivers a dynamic, user-friendly shopping experience. It fetches real-time product listings via RESTful APIs and ensures secure transactions through Stripe integration, epitomizing a balanced blend of design, functionality, and security in contemporary e-commerce solutions.

title: Anime Website
description: This application demonstrates my ability to integrate external data sources and present them in a user-friendly format, highlighting my skills in [relevant skills like API integration, front-end development].

title: Clothing Store
description: Developed an innovative e-commerce platform using Sanity for seamless content management and Next.js for a dynamic, responsive user interface. This project showcases my ability to integrate cutting-edge technologies to create a fast, scalable, and user-friendly online shopping experience.

title: Perfume Store
description: Developed a bespoke e-commerce platform dedicated to luxury perfumes, offering a seamless and elegant shopping experience. This user-friendly site features quick load times, a secure checkout process, and a sensory-rich interface designed to entice fragrance enthusiasts.
